page.title: 07Leegomery Parks
page.content: We have got two{parks}in Leegomery.We have a slide and swings.We play football on a field.There are two trees that look like goalposts.The park is brilliant,there are rocking horses with their heads off and there is a{game}called "Bomb".To play this you need at least four people.You get a football and someone holds the ball;you count backwards from 10 to 1 and whoever is holding the ball at 1 is out because they are blown up. We also play "spot"and cricket."Spot" is where you kick a ball against a wall and the other person has to kick it back.If you miss the wall you are out.The best way to play is to kick the ball hard so the other person will miss
